work.head: Boonmelab
text: I developed a geolocation vitualization platform with partner company.
Here I had learnt React, Deck.gl and how to work with the real customer.

work.head: Wongnai Media
text: I developed features of 'Wongnai Cooking' web application according to each sprint.
Here I had learnt React, Agile process with the team, and how to write a maintainable code.

work.head: H-Lab Consulting
text: Project: “ Venti, Hospital ER Patients Management System”
I developed a progressive web app for tablet with Angular
and field-tested it for product improvement by collecting feedback.

work.head: Actimotive
text: I designed a prototype and developed the cross platform web application using Angular.

work.head: Young Passionate Program
text: A set of educational events for students organized by a group of young people who believe in power of young generation
I'm resposible for the ofiicial program website design and development.

work.head: TEDxKMUTT
text: With my passion for self-improvement, I joined TEDxKMUTT organized by students in my university.
I developed the TEDxKMUTT 2016 website with other developers, designers, and project managers.
